When you switch from View/Unread to View/Read the current message changes status from Unread to Read

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Switch to "View/Unread" 
2. Select a messge
3. message/mark/unread
4. Switch back to View/All
Actual Results:  
Message switches back to Read

Expected Results:  
Message should stay Unread

I think this behavior is wrong because of the specific example given. The Use-Case is that I'm skimming through my Unread mail, and want to leave one of them Unread to remind me to remind me to reply to it.
